import { useContext } from "react" import "./CartListSummary.css" import { CartContext } from "../../contexts/CartContext" export const CartListSummary = () => { const {cart} = useContext(CartContext) const cartItemsTotal = cart.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr.quantity, 0); const cartItemsTotalPrice = cart.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr.price*curr.quantity, 0); const handleCheckout = () => { } return (

Price Details

Price ({cartItemsTotal} items)

₹{cartItemsTotalPrice}

Delivery Fee

Free

Total Amount

₹{cartItemsTotalPrice}

) }
